name: Formula Dice
overview: Game presented in the MSXdev'08 contest. FORMULA DICE is a little game about the Formula 1. It is a managerial game in which you start on the Formula 3 and you have to reach and win the Formula 1. To do this you have to improve your team points; they are divided in driver and motor points. Why this division? Because in every round (like in real GP) they will be multiplied for a decimal factor to simulate fast GP where the motor is important and slow GP where counts the driver skill.
